name: ItzaZoo
description: Children jump right into a drawing adventure with friendly animals that are ready to play and help them learn to read! Using Living Ink™ – Sabi’s unique drawing recognition system - kid's drawings become one-of-a kind interactive objects that form the centerpiece of the game's action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1 Ghz or fasterMemory: 512MB of RAMGraphics: 1024x768 or greater screen resolution, 64MB Directx® 9.0c compliantDirectX®: 9.0c compliantHard Drive: 110MB of free spaceSound: Sound Directx® 9.0c compliant

reviews.review_text: Sequel to the critically acclaimed itzabitza, featuring all the ♥♥♥♥♥ drawing fun of the first game, only now taking place in a zoo.
